lead_paragraph: The sport’s world governing body is investigating Trevor Graham, the coach of the sprinter Justin Gatlin, for alleged doping violations. The International Association of Athletics Federations said yesterday that the inquiry into Graham’s activities would be carried out in conjunction with the United States Anti-Doping Agency. At least six athletes who trained under Graham have received doping suspensions.
